settings.ftr_desc: *CuraLin, CuraLife products, and statements on this website and other CuraLife assets have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration, and are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Results will vary from one person to another and there is no guarantee of specific results. We recommend consulting your doctor or your primary healthcare provider before using our products, especially when if you’re taking any medications.

settings.winr_desc: Every day, people around the world connect in our active community to share advice, get support, and help each other live a healthier fuller life. It’s a movement changing lives across the globe.

settings.refr_desc:
Earn Free bottles of CuraLin as a special thank you for referring your friends.
You’ll also get to send them a $25 coupon off their first order!

settings.strbnr_desc: It started with a son and his father...

settings.advsr_desc: CuraLife’s medical advisory board chairman is Professor Itamar Raz, one of the top diabetologists in the world, the head of the Israel National Council of Diabetes and is the founder and head of the National Diabetes Prevention and Care Plan in Israel. Professor Raz has over 320 publications in peer-reviewed journals and headed the Diabetes Unit at Hadassah University Hospital from 2000-2015.

Dr. Sarah Brewer is a global expert in the field of Natural Sciences, with a MB from Cambridge University and a Master's degree from the University of Surrey. She has 30+ years of experience in prestigious hospitals and author of 60+ landmark books on health.

Dr. Sara Kaplan is a clinical dietitian and worldwide acclaimed diet expert. Dr. Kaplan heads the Department of Human Nutrition and Diet for a leading national private healthcare provider. Dr. Kaplan is the nutritional leader at CuraLife.

Joel has been a Partner at Mishcon de Reya since 2006. He advises and acts for entrepreneurs and company owners from a wide variety of business sectors, with a large part of his practice having an international aspect. He holds an LLB from Bar Ilan University and a Master's Degree in Law from London University. Joel is on the advisory board of CuraLife & two high-tech investment funds.

Dr. Choppe leads Cukierman & Co. Life Sciences and has been involved in more than 50 Medtech and biotech corporate finance transactions and advisory assignments. Laurent brings extensive international life sciences experience in managing multifunctional teams and setting up new businesses in pharmaceuticals, biotechnology, nutraceuticals, and direct-to-consumer markets. Dr. Choppe is a Doctor of Veterinary Medicine of the University Paris XII and earned an MBA from INSEAD (Fontainebleau, France).

Dr. Uri Eliyahu has a Ph.D in Medical Sciences specializing in Epidemiology. Dr. Eliyahu is a licensed pharmacist and holds a MSc in Physiology and Pharmacology. Dr Elyahu is a prestigious lecturer in top universities. Dr. Elyahu is the pharmacology lead at CuraLife.

settings.dia_titl: It started with a son and his father...
settings.dia_desc:
When my father was diagnosed with type 2 diabetes, it transformed both our lives. I experienced first-hand the challenges my father faced maintaining a high quality of life with all the constraints of his condition. From that day, my mission became to help my father maintain healthy blood sugar levels and eliminate his lifestyle constraints, without any negative effects on his lifestyle.

I found the answer in Ayurveda; that’s how CuraLife was born. Since then, CuraLife has expanded its vision to improving the quality of life for everyone around the world. We do this by blending modernized ancient Ayurveda principles with modern-day science and technology and creating supportive communities for people on their journeys to health.

Join us on our mission to disrupt an industry and help millions of people lead higher quality lives.
settings.cmpncltr_desc: The CuraLife team is driven by one mission – improving the quality of life for people around the world. And we work incredibly hard to achieve that goal through life-changing products, easily digestible education, and thriving communities. We care deeply, think globally, and work tirelessly to create a happier, healthier world.

settings.cpwr_desc: Supports healthy pancreatic beta cells function
Promotes Short & Long Term Healthy & Balanced blood glucose levels
Reduces the craving for sugars & other carbs
Supports pancreas, liver, and kidney health

settings.wht_desc:
CuraLin is a 100% natural glucose support supplement for people looking to maintain healthy blood sugar levels and enjoy life's events to the fullest. It works by blending ancient Ayurveda practices with modern science and technology into a spectacular, synergistic glucose support formula.

Each CuraLin capsule is manufactured close to the source, using only premium ingredients. Secret production processes ensure that each capsule is highly potent and safe. All facilities are GMP & ISO 9001 certified, independent quality controls assures that you get only the safest, highest quality supplements possible.

CuraLin comprises of 9 natural ingredients. Scroll down to learn more about the formula.

settings.mntain_desc: CuraLin is designed specifically for people looking for an effective and natural way to maintain healthy glucose levels so they can enjoy life’s events to the fullest

settings.retail_desc: CuraLife is on a mission to help everyone in the world lead great lives through health. If you share in this vision and have the expertise to bring CuraLife products to your home country, we would love to explore partnership opportunities with you.
settings.retail_txtdesc: CuraLife is unique because our products really work. Testimonial upon testimonial confirms – our products change lives. That’s why we measure our impact, not in bottles sold, but in lives changes. Our loved ones are CuraLife customers too.

settings.retail_desc: Every CuraLife product goes through a rigorous R&D process to ensure an optimal formulation. Our GMP & ISO 9001 certified extraction and production facilities ensure premium, safe, and high-quality products, verified by independent 3rd parties. Everything we do, from formulation to extraction is measured for objective hard data and backed up by science. That’s how we have the best products on the market.

settings.rtlprdct_desc: Recommended for Safe and Powerful Glucose Support
settings.rtlbtm_desc: If you’re excited by the impact CuraLife products can make in your community, we should discuss partnership opportunities. Simply fill in the contact form to get started.

settings.blg_des: The latest advice and research for a healthier life

settings.tab_des: CuraLin is different than anything else available on the market right now, and anything you may have tried in the past.
CuraLin offers people looking for advanced glucose support an effective and 100% natural way to maintain healthy glucose levels.
Each vegan-friendly capsule contains our powerful Ayurvedic formula, free from dairy, gluten, preservatives, and artificial colors & flavors.

settings.title:
Subscribe to
Weekly Wellness
settings.subheading: A weekly blast on healthy living for chronic conditions
settings.newsletter-description:
Join over 35,000 people getting the best guidance, recipes, and latest news for living well with diabetes, and other health conditions. Each week we will send out a dedicated, informative email directly to your inbox.
Your weekly dose of actionable info on how to live well with type 2, plus special access to CuraLife offers.
